text: "How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days," meanwhile, starred Hudson and Matthew McConaughey as two scheming singletons who both make bets unbeknownst to the other — hers, that she can get a man to dump her within 10 days, and his, that he can make a woman fall in love with him in the same time period.
title: Kate Hudson pokes fun at Scaramucci with ‘How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days’ meme

meta_data.description: Ousted White House communications director Anthony Scaramucci's short D.C. tenure looks all too familiar to Kate Hudson.
